posts.post_title: FS (Price reduced) - 2 SGC graded T206 John Titus EPDG's.
posts.post_content: For Sale - T206 Titus EPDG's - Thought I'd repost these with price cuts, tough one's to find. Your choice $510 venmo no fee or $525 pp gs each. Price includes shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking. Note: NC residents add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.
